Don Nelson

Milwaukee Bucks, Golden State Warriors, Dallas Mavericks

Draft Rating:

C

Don Nelson ranks in the 47th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Nelson's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 3 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Tim Hardaway with 14th pick but was worth 1th pick.
  • Drafted Sidney Moncrief with 5th pick but was worth 2th pick.
  • Drafted Dwayne Morton with 45th pick but was worth 15th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Kent Benson with 1th pick but was worth 12th pick.
  • Drafted Tyrone Hill with 11th pick but was worth 49th pick.
  • Drafted Alton Lister with 21th pick but was worth 58th pick.

Trade Rating:

C-

Don Nelson ranks in the 42th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Pat Garrity, Dirk Nowitzki to DAL.
  • Lost Robert Traylor to MIL.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Alton Lister to GSW.
  • Lost Gary Payton to SEA.

Signing Rating:

D

Don Nelson ranks in the 31th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed John Lucas in 1987.
  • Signed Marquis Daniels in 2003.
  • Signed Keith Jennings in 1992.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Paul Mokeski in 1983.
  • Signed Hubert Davis in 1997.
  • Signed Tom Tolbert in 1989.
